title: Phase 5: Settings UI
description: Create SlackEmojiSettingTab with gallery, upload/edit/delete functionality, and alias management

title: Phase 4: Custom Emoji
description: Implement CustomEmojiWatcher, extend EmojiManager for custom emoji with image loading and caching
close_reason: Completed with all 61 tests passing and 94% coverage. Implemented CustomEmojiWatcher with EventRef-based vault event handling for automatic emoji loading from file system.

title: Phase 3: Live Preview Support
description: Implement EmojiWidget, EmojiDecorator, and EmojiEditorPlugin for CodeMirror 6 with tests
close_reason: Completed with all 51 tests passing and 94% coverage. Implemented EmojiWidget (100% coverage), EmojiDecorator, and EmojiEditorPlugin for live preview. Added CodeMirror 6 integration.

title: Phase 7: Documentation & Release Prep
description: Create README.md, DEVELOPMENT.md, Makefile, and user commands

title: Phase 2: Unicode Emoji (Reading Mode)
description: Implement EmojiLoader, EmojiManager with Unicode registry, and reading mode post-processor with tests
close_reason: Completed with all 42 tests passing and 93% coverage. Loaded 1933 Unicode emoji with 43 aliases. All coverage metrics exceed 80% target.

title: Phase 1: Foundation & Tooling setup
description: Set up project structure, configuration files, build system, and development tools
close_reason: Completed foundation setup: devbox config, package.json, manifest.json, TypeScript config, ESLint/Prettier setup, Vitest config, esbuild config, basic plugin structure, GitHub Actions workflows (CI, release, dependabot), Makefile, and .gitignore/.gitattributes

title: Phase 8: Quality Assurance & Release
description: Run full test suite, achieve coverage targets, run quality checks, and create v0.1.0 release

title: Phase 6: Autocomplete
description: Implement EmojiSuggester with fuzzy search and styled popup
